survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Eco-Friendly Household Cleaning Products Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding the use of eco-friendly household cleaning products, including factors influencing purchase decisions and satisfaction levels.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase eco-friendly household cleaning products?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to capture frequency. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase eco-friendly household cleaning products?

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase eco-friendly cleaning products? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse influences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase eco-friendly cleaning products? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when using eco-friendly cleaning products.
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Always' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the response box is large enough for detailed answers.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when using eco-friendly cleaning products.
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Always' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the effectiveness of eco-friendly cleaning products compared to traditional ones?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Always' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the effectiveness of eco-friendly cleaning products compared to traditional ones?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Always' in Q1.

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for eco-friendly cleaning products if they were proven to be more effective than traditional products?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the price difference
questions.client_notes: Capture willingness to pay with clear options.
